name: DOCS_RCVD_NOTES_INTERVALS
description: This table contains the IDs of the FHIR Document Reference resources for the interval notes associated with a clinical note.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the external clinical note in the record of documents received. Together with DOCUMENT_ID and CONTACT_DATE_REAL, this forms the foreign key to DOCS_RCVD_CLINICAL_NOTES.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple interval notes associated with the an external clinical note from the DOCS_RCVD_CLINICAL_NOTES table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ASSOC_INTER_DOCREF_RESRC_IDENT
columns.description: The IDs of the FHIR Document Reference resources for the interval notes associated with this clinical note. Populated when the clinical note is a source for one or more intervals.
